$SOFI CEO Anthony Noto announced Big Business Banking.

$GOOGL is working on TorchTPU to enable PyTorch models to run directly on its TPUs.

The joint effort with $META aims to lower switching costs and give AI teams more flexibility in infrastructure choice.

$AMZN AWS CEO said ~90% of executives already see positive ROI from AI & called AWS the strongest platform to build agentic AI on.

That‚Äôs because AWS already runs where companies real data & workflows live which lets AI agents take real actions instead of just generating answers.

The project is now in financing limbo as lenders push tougher terms amid concerns over Oracle‚Äôs rising AI data center spend & $100B+ in net debt.

Bernie Sanders calling for a moratorium on AI data centers is effectively calling for the U.S. to slow itself down while China keeps building. 

That‚Äôs not ‚Äúgiving democracy time to catch up.‚Äù It‚Äôs handing China exactly what he wants.

$JOBY announced plans to double its U.S. manufacturing capacity.

The expansion supports production of up to 4 aircraft per month by 2027.
$AAPL is reportedly in talks to move iPhone chip assembly & packaging to India for the first time, deepening its supply-chain shift away from China.

$HUT is partnering with Anthropic & Fluidstack to build up to 2.3 GW of AI data center capacity in the U.S.

Anthropic gets first rights to an additional ~2 GW across the River Bend campus& Hut 8‚Äôs broader pipeline with capacity coming online as early as 2027.

John Kinsel Sr. was a Navajo Code Talker and U.S. Marine Corps vet who served in World War II. He was one of the last surviving members of this elite group, whose unbreakable code based on the Navajo language played a critical role in securing Allied victories in the Pacific.

3 masked teenagers approached a home around 4 a.m., attempting to rob residents. One of the teens fired shots first. A resident returned fire, killing all three teens. Authorities ruled it justifiable self-defense under Georgia's stand-your-ground laws.
